basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Saranya Dwarampudi. I have 6 years of experience in developing Web Applications using HTML(5), CSS(3),TypeScript, Angular(6/8/9/12). Thank you

projects.title: TSO
projects.description: TS Overgave application is a small application used by KLM Royal Dutch airlines for logging complaints like technical aircraft problems, tracking the status of problems etc...
technologies: Being a sole Angular Developer, i handled all the front end requirments of this appication and delivered.
Involved in meetings with clients to understand the existing MS Access application and the the scope criticality of the new business needs.
Worked with clients and provided them the recommendations that would help ensure they achieved their overall business goals.
Designing and developing the web application using Angular12/13/14, HTML5, SCSS,Angular Material, TypeScript
Developed the application using Reactive forms
Tested REST API's using Postman and integrated into angular application.
Implemented custom PIPES, AuthGuard. Resolvers, Interceptor.
Implemented Angular Router with Guards to enable navigation from one view to the nextas customer performs application tasks.
Implemented print and attachment functionality.
Added media queries to support Desktop, Laptop, iPad.
Used JSON to send request to the server to check the functionality of the websites and for storing and exchanging information between browser and servers.
Worked on Bitbucket, GitHub as a version control
Designed and developed the application using Agile Scrum methodology by breaking down the project to several sprints.
Used JIRA to keep track of bugs to reduce downtime, increase productivity, and improve communication.
Worked with JASMINE unit test framework to write unit test cases and increased the code quality to 93%
Used PostgreSQL for testing data.
Deployed application in Azure cloud.
Created defect tracking using JIRA and reviewed them in subsequent iterations of the application development process.
Planned test cases for the application and implemented them to ensure that the requirements were met.
Conducted sprint planning meetings to prioritize backlogs for design and development and sprint review meetings to identify the gaps in the project and address them in subsequent sprint cycles.

projects.title: Assessor - Web Application
projects.description: Assessor application is used to create and configure exams. The application was developed by ROC team, since the Rest API is developed in Django( not a standard solution, we had to rebuild it using spring boot). Web application is developed in ReactJS.
technologies: I was lead on this application, i coordinated with other 2 junior front end developers.
Analyzed how react application was build and understood the state and lifecycle of the application.
Integrated frontend react application with spring boot.
Developed few requirements in the application.
Tested REST API's using Postman and integrated into react application.
Used JSON to send request to the server to check the functionality of the websites and for storing and exchanging information between browser and servers.
Worked on GitHub as a version control.
Integrated the application using Agile Scrum methodology by breaking down the project to several sprints.
Used JIRA to keep track of bugs to reduce downtime, increase productivity, and improve communication.
Deployed application in Azure cloud.

technologies: I was lead on this application, i coordinated with other 2 junior front end developers.
Analyzed how mobile application was build and understood the state and lifecycle of the application.
Integrated frontend mobile application with spring boot.
Developed few requirements in the mobile application.
Used JSON to send request to the server to check the functionality of the websites and for storing and exchanging information between browser and servers.
Worked on GitHub as a version control.
Integrated the application using Agile Scrum methodology by breaking down the project to several sprints.
Used JIRA to keep track of bugs to reduce downtime, increase productivity, and improve communication.
